test_case.description: Pricing inquiry requiring knowledge base lookup

detailed_results.email_agent_response:
Subject: Re: Your Inquiry

Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to Acme Corp. How can I assist you today?

If you provide more details about your inquiry, I will be able to help you promptly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

Aparna Prasad
CEO, Acme Corp
123 Main St, Anytown, USA 12345
Phone: 123-456-7890
Email: support@acme.com
Website: https://www.acme.com
detailed_results.langgraph_agent_response: Hello Alex, Thank you for your interest in our premium subscription. Our pricing plans are as follows: Basic - $9.99/month, Standard - $19.99/month, Enterprise - $29.99/month. All premium features are included in the Enterprise plan. To access premium features, simply log in to your account and navigate to the 'Premium' section. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Best regards, Aparna Prasad CEO, Acme Corp. 123 Main St, Anytown, USA 12345 Phone: 123-456-7890 Email: support@acme.com Website: https://www.acme.com

Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to Acme Corp. My name is Aparna Prasad, CEO of the company. 

I apologize for the inconvenience you are facing in retrieving specific details on our premium subscription pricing plans and features. Our team is working diligently to provide you with the information as soon as possible. 

If you have any further questions or need immediate assistance, please feel free to contact us at support@acme.com or visit our website at https://www.acme.com. 

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,

Aparna Prasad

detailed_results.email_agent_response:
Subject: Re: Refund Request

Dear Customer,

Thank you for reaching out to Acme Corp.

I understand that you are requesting a refund. As per our company policy, refunds must be requested within 30 days of purchase. To submit a refund request, please provide your order number and reason for refund through our customer portal.

For technical support, our help desk portal is available 24/7. If you have any questions or need assistance with accessing premium features included in the enterprise subscription plan, please log in to your account and navigate to the 'premium' section.

If you require further assistance, feel free to contact us at support@acme.com or visit our website at https://www.acme.com.

Thank you for choosing Acme Corp.

Best regards,

Aparna Prasad
CEO
Acme Corp
123 Main St, Anytown, USA 12345
123-456-7890
support@acme.com
